item.title: Plasma Bigscreen
item.description:
Plasma Bigscreen is a completely open UI stack for your personal TV box

Plasma Bigscreen on Raspberry Pi 4 Model B 8GB

(Total Setup Time: 30 mins)

Plasma Bigscreen will transform your regular TV into a smart one. With built-in Mycroft AI voice assistant, you can use voice command to control. So, even though it is still in beta stage, with the arrival of the microHDMI cable, I am eager to test drive Plasma Bigscreen on Raspberry Pi 4 Model B 8GB!
